itemtype.description: This type represents a cron job that updates stock levels for transport offerings.
This type represents a travel schedule holding travel related information and extends warehouse type to utilize stock functionality.
This type represents a location that handles passenger transportation and transfers.
This type represents a point to point segment. One or more sectors form a travel route.
This type represents a building used by passengers and travel companies for facilitating a trip or journey.
This type represents a travel route. A route comprises one or more sectors.
This type represents an agency or an organization that provides travel related services to the public.
This type holds the information of a transport vehicle.
This type represents a ship information.
This type represents an aircraft information.
This type represents a bus information.
This type represents a train information.
This type represents a travel medium that transports people.
This type represents an accommodation map.
This type represents a trip activity.
This type represents a particular place or position.
Extending price row type to include travel attributes.
This type represents any item next or close to the accommodation that may affect the journey.
This type represents additional details about the particular accommodation.
This type represents a class of accommodations for a transport vehicle.
This type represents a mapping for transport vehicle information and configuration.
This type represents the mapping between bundle template and transport offering.

attribute.description: Attribute which identifies a unique value for a BundleTemplateTransportOfferingMapping

itemtype.description: This item is responsible to store information selected in 'Create Schedule' wizard in backoffice
This type represents a travel limitation or rule.
This type represents an accommodation selected by the traveller.
Extending tax row type to include travel attributes.
Extending category type to include additional attributes.
Extending SolrIndexerQuery type to include additional run time parameters for system set up queries
This type represents the mapping of default sort order for solr indexed type
This type represents disruption that affected the order
This type represents the previous search made by User
Extending product type to include additional travel attributes.
This type represents the fare options and fare products for a journey.
Extending product type to include additional travel attributes.
Extending product type to include additional travel attributes.
This type represents a fare that is used for a particular journey.
This type represents the seats of a transport vehicle.
This type represents the ancillary products.
This type represents the fee product.
This type represents the extra product for accommodation.
This type represents the configured accommodation types and the bookable status.
Extending configured accommodation type, this type represents an aircraft cabin.
Extending configured accommodation type, this type represents an aircraft deck.
Extending point of service type to include travel attributes.
Extending StockLevel type to include date related fields
This type represents a traveller.
This type represents a traveller information.
Extending traveller info type to represent a passenger information.
This type represents a passenger type.
This type represents vehicle information.
This type represents a pet information.
This type represents special request details.
This type represents a special service request.
This type represents the remarks or descriptions for a special request.
This type represents the preferences for a traveller.
Extending Consignment to include travel info .
Extending AbstractOrder to include travel attributes.
Extending Order to include travel attributes.
Extending Cart to include travel attributes.
Extending OrderEntry type to include travel attributes.
This item is used to group order entries for the same accommodation and to store common information
This type represents travel order entry info.
Extending customer type to add travel attributes.
A mapping table between a customer and an order.

attribute.description: Attribute represents a customer object that will be mapped to an order.

itemtype.description: Extending BaseStore type with additional attributes.
Extends existing ContentPage type with additional attributes.
This type represents a property or building having some accommodations offered in it. Typical example is an hotel or a bed and breakfast
This type represents a cronjob that creates stock levels for accommodation offerings.
This type represents a cronjob that creates the RatePlanConfig and the MarketingRatePlanInfo
This type represents an accommodation provider, like an hotel chain
This type represents a facility that could be extended by a property or accommodation facility
This item holds the media information for an accommodation offering
This type represents a facility that can be assigned to an accommodation offering (property)
This type represents a facility that can be assigned to an accommodation offering (property)
This type holds information about accommodation related order or cart entries
This type maps an accommodation product with a bundletemplate
This type holds min and max quantity of a certain guest type (depending on age range)
This item represents the marketing configuration to be used at index time for a specified number of adults and consisting of one or many rate plan config.
This item represents the configuration for a rate plan to be used in a marketing rate plan info
This item represents a pricing plan for a particular accommodation that could consist of many room rates
This type represents a room rate that is used in a rate plan.
This item represent a financialInfo that could be extended
This item represents a cancel penalty that can be applied to a rate plan
This item represents a guarantee that is required by a rate plan
This item represents a generic rateplan inclusion and some editorial information
This item represents a guest count relative to a passenger type
This item represents a date range from a start to an end date
This item represents a room preference relative to a preference type
This item represents a static deal bundle template
This item represents the transport part of a static deal bundle template
This item represents the route information of the transport part of a static deal bundle template
This item represents the accommodation part of a static deal bundle template
